job_description: We are seeking a Senior AI Engineer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in full-stack development, system design, and team collaboration. You will be responsible for developing scalable web applications, mentoring junior developers, and contributing to architectural decisions.

technical_proficiency.description: Knowledge of required technologies and coding practices

problem_solving.description: Ability to analyze and solve complex technical problems

communication.description: Clear communication and explanation of technical concepts

experience.description: Relevant work experience and project examples
